XenotypeDef.label: Avalonian
XenotypeDef.description: A avali hailing from avalon. While Guardian nanites and other various augments improve their chances of survival on this world, they are not fully adapted to this environment.

XenotypeDef.label: Solfeather
XenotypeDef.description: This avali has either been modified or adapted for life on the rim through various genetic processes. While being more suited to the temperatures of this planet, they are heavier than their avalonian counterparts.
